title: Karen Carney column: Why Mikel Arteta is making Arsenal fitter and better
description: In her latest BBC Sport column, Karen Carney analyses how Mikel Arteta is making Arsenal fitter and better.

title: The battle over which flag to fly in America's Chinatowns
description: Chinatowns across the US are switching to the flag of mainland China, but not without protest.

title: Sittingbourne widower learns ballet and passes exam
description: Bernard Bibby took up the ballet classes four years ago following the death of his wife of 55 years.

title: Sri Lanka: 'Too many twins' hinder world record attempt

title: Cardiff's Fitzalan High class all receive A* GCSE grade
description: The pupils gasped as they realised they had all achieved the top result, their assistant head teacher says.

title: Can one mile take 10 years off your life?
description: Is Sir Keir Starmer right that Somers Town in London has life expectancy 10 years below somewhere a mile away?

title: Lord Hall to step down as BBC's director general
description: Tony Hall says the decision to leave after seven years in the role has "been hard".

title: New China virus: Number of cases jumps as infection spreads to Beijing

description: The collapse of the company, founded in 1881, puts more than 1,000 jobs at risk

title: Harry and Meghan: No other option but to step back, says duke

title: In pictures: Clouds create perfect conditions for stunning sunset
description: High cloud and exceptionally clear air created the perfect conditions for an incredible sunset on Sunday.

title: Super Bowl 2020: Mahomes runs in 27-yard touchdown as Kansas City Chiefs beat Tennessee Titans
description: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes scores a brilliant touchdown after evading several tackles in a 27-yard run as Chiefs beat the Tennessee Titans.

title: HS2: Rail link costs could rise to £106bn, says review
description: There is "considerable risk" the price of the high-speed line could rise by another 20%, a report finds.

description: The men in their 20s and 30s were pronounced dead at the scene in Ilford - two men have been arrested.

description: "I must listen to my body and rest," the star tells fans in Lisbon, Portugal.

title: Should schools be allowed to ban slang words like 'peng'?
description: Research suggests that slang bans in schools may be more harmful than good.
